summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4168 for the improvement of 11th Avenue Northeast, from East 80th Street to East 82nd Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49767, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
